description: Insert description of the world/game here.

0.1.0.description:
Prebuilt the Client Mod for testing.
### Instructions
1. Install [BepInEx](https://github.com/BepInEx/BepInEx/releases/tag/v5.4.23.2), the x64 build.
2. Run the game once so BepInEx sets itself up
3. Unzip doronko_wanko_ap.zip and copy its contents into the root folder with the game .exe (so that the BepInEx folder merges with the one already there)
4. Edit AP.json with your Room information.
5. Play

### Known Issue
The Damage threshold locations are not functioning. You should exclude them for now or you might get unwinnable seeds without server cheating. (The yaml in the repository excludes them for you.)
0.1.0.title: 0.1.0 - Prebuilt for testing

0.2.0.description:
You NEED to use the new .apworld and template .yaml, I changed the spelling of the game to match how it's written on Steam

Updated the AP world download to not crash host.yaml

### Instructions
1. Install [BepInEx](https://github.com/BepInEx/BepInEx/releases/tag/v5.4.23.2), the x64 build.
2. Run the game once so BepInEx sets itself up
3. Download `doronko_wanko_ap.zip` from the Releases and copy its contents into the root folder with the game .exe (so that the BepInEx folder merges with the one already there)
4. Edit `AP.json` with your Room information.
5. Play
0.2.0.title: 0.2.0 - A Stable Release!

0.3.0.description:
Thanks for all the testing and feedback! You do need to download the apworld again, because the logic has been changed.

In this update, logic has been corrected, so `Lot's of footprints` properly requires the train to be fixed.
Thanks to feedback, I've also adjusted the size of sphere 1, by locking the Mom, Train, and Wine Buttons behind unlocks as well. (They'll just pop in when they're received.)
I've renamed the Damage Gift Locations to better reflect that they are consecutive goals, rather than an overall number as it was previously.

I've also added a `glitched` logic setting, which allows for some skips to be considered in logic. (It hasn't been tested as well, because I don't know how to do them.)

### Instructions
1. Install [BepInEx](https://github.com/BepInEx/BepInEx/releases/tag/v5.4.23.2), the x64 build.
2. Run the game once so BepInEx sets itself up
3. Download `doronko_wanko_ap.zip` from the Releases and copy its contents into the root folder with the game .exe (so that the BepInEx folder merges with the one already there)
4. Edit `AP.json` with your Room information.
5. Play
0.3.0.title: 0.3.0 - Fixes and new Features

0.3.1.description:
Thanks for all the testing and feedback! You do need to download the apworld again, because a missing location was added.

I fully rewrote the code for the mod to use HarmonyX. This greatly reduces the complexity as well as the file size of the mod itself, as it no long needs the MMHOOK file to be included.

Additionally, a longstanding vanilla bug has finally been fixed, the Damage Overshoot Bug, in which if you overshoot the damage target, any extra damage is completely lost. Now it carries over!
I've also added the missing `Champagne Time!` location to the AP world, so you will need to update it.

### Instructions
1. Install [BepInEx](https://github.com/BepInEx/BepInEx/releases/tag/v5.4.23.2), the x64 build.
2. Run the game once so BepInEx sets itself up
3. Download `doronko_wanko_ap.zip` from the Releases and copy its contents into the root folder with the game .exe (so that the BepInEx folder merges with the one already there)
4. Edit `AP.json` with your Room information.
5. Play
0.3.1.title: 0.3.1 - Cleaner Code and Big Bug Fixes

0.3.2.description:
AP version 0.6.2 stopped the game from connecting.
`Archipelago.MultiClient.Net` was updated to the latest stable version, 6.6.0 and the library support was likewise updated to 0.6.0.

No changes to the .apworld

### Instructions
1. Install [BepInEx](https://github.com/BepInEx/BepInEx/releases/tag/v5.4.23.2), the x64 build.
2. Run the game once so BepInEx sets itself up
3. Download `doronko_wanko_ap.zip` from the Releases and copy its contents into the root folder with the game .exe (so that the BepInEx folder merges with the one already there)
4. Edit `AP.json` with your Room information.
5. Play
0.3.2.title: 0.3.2 - Update AP Library for AP 0.6.2
